title: Larsa Pippen of RHOM
description:
The OG Housewife, Larsa Pippen, tore it up on Miami this year, and talks about why she returned to the series, and how different it was for her this second time around. She gets real about her divorce from Scottie Pippen, raising 4 kids, rediscovering her own identity, and following her passion! Plus, Lala updates her latest foray into the dating scene and what she’s learning about texting, sexting, and the importance of making decisions that are right for her and being comfortable in her own body and sexuality.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
